channel.title: Learn how to grow marijuana here!
channel.description:
Hello,
First of all you need to get marijuana seeds wich you can get from friends or there maybe some seeds while you are buykng marijuana from someone else.Then you plant the seeds.[b]Know read along as i explain below::[/b] [glow=green,2,300][b](CATUION:The leaves are useless, people don't smoke leaves, they smoke the buds)[/b][/glow]
During the long days of summer the plant grows tall and healthy. During fall, when there is less light the plant realizes it will die soon so it starts creating buds with seeds in them.The buds are what get you high when smoked.The buds really depend. A good harvest should get you about 5 ounces of weed from a single plant.You can sell an ounce for around 200 bucks.Some pro's can get over 16 ounces.seeds will only exist if a male plant has polunated the plant.Not all buds have seeds though, they only have seeds if a male plant has pollunated the female plant. The female plants realizes it is going to die soon so it starts producing seeds inside of the buds. but if there is no male, the buds will not have seeds. Growers try to get rid of any male plants because they do not want the bud to be full of seeds.
(mind you, an ounce can get you high 56 times.)
So those are the basics of marijuana.;)

item.title: Learn how to grow marijuana here!
item.dc:creator: @jensie jensie
item.description:
@jensie wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:3, topic:61244”]I was taught that plants dont have sexes, they have both reproductual organs and the pollonate themselves i though? anyways yeah … nice tut.[/quote] They have. Nearly all plants have.

Read full topic

item.title: Learn how to grow marijuana here!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

93dcthugs93:

It’s a revolution. Pot is legal in Canada, it is in like every other state & it’s going to become legal in America soon (H)

Pot isn’t legal in Canada? I know places like Toronto go a little easy on it(I think ~14 grams and your usually safe), but I know that it is still illegal in every province. I’m not sure, maybe BC has some easier laws on it, but here in Ontario and just about everywhere else they are pretty strict.

What’s weird is I kept reading something about Ontario allowing you to hold a certain amount, but this is not true. Strangely I read this on high-life, but I looked it up.

Read full topic

item.title: Learn how to grow marijuana here!
item.dc:creator: @CRIPZ_Chick CRIPZ Chick
item.description:
@CRIPZ_Chick wrote:

jme_009:

Anyways, this is what is wrong with this thread: Really there isn’t a lot of information. What you should be covering is(at the very least) the different stages of growth(germination, seedling, vegatative, flowering), the different vital minerals(nitrogen, phosphorus, pottasium, calcium), the amount of light per day compared to what stage of growth it is in, curing and drying, etc…

I know it’s just basics for newbs.

Read full topic

item.title: Learn how to grow marijuana here!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

davidude36:

I was taught that plants dont have sexes, they have both reproductual organs and the pollonate themselves i though? anyways yeah … nice tut.

Not sure about other plants, but marijuana can be male or female. The male plants actually have pollen sacks, which will pollinate the female and then the female will have seeds. Those seeds will then be a mix between the two strains of marijuana. For instance, crossing a white widow with super skunk makes white shark, which will have characteristics of both strains.

Read full topic
